meanings.sent1: The school's annual talent show was a beautiful pageantry of student performances.
meanings.sent2: The royal wedding was a grand pageantry of tradition and elegance.
meanings.sent3: The town's attempt at a parade turned into a chaotic pageantry of mismatched costumes.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the night sky in a dazzling pageantry of colors and sparks.
meanings.sent5: The circus was a lively pageantry of acrobats, clowns, and animals performing under the big top.

meanings.definition: The use of elaborate or showy displays
meanings.sent1: The fashion show featured a pageantry of extravagant gowns and accessories.
meanings.sent2: The magician's act included a pageantry of colorful scarves and disappearing acts.
meanings.sent3: The chef's plating of the dish was a culinary pageantry of artistic swirls and garnishes.
meanings.sent4: The theater production was a visual pageantry of elaborate sets and costumes.
meanings.sent5: The holiday decorations transformed the street into a festive pageantry of lights and ornaments.

meanings.definition: The world of beauty pageants and competitions
meanings.sent1: She dedicated herself to the pageantry world, competing in beauty contests across the country.
meanings.sent2: The documentary explored the behind-the-scenes drama of the pageantry industry.
meanings.sent3: The reality TV show followed the lives of young contestants navigating the pageantry scene.
meanings.sent4: The magazine cover featured the latest winner of the pageantry competition.
meanings.sent5: The online forum buzzed with discussions about the upcoming pageantry event.
